string.text: The Monolith base was ambushed by the military, so I had to take a Niva and get the hell out of there. Gusarov said there are a mine at Darkscape where I can hide from the helicopter, thus I need to get there as soon as possible.
I've got to the tunnel, and now need to find the mine entrance.
The entrance is found; now it's essential to move deeper... unless I want to live here forever.

Another Sin creeps knocked me out, stole my stuff and now want me to get some important documents from Borov - the headman of bandits. Now I need to get outside, reach Dark Valley, happen to steal the documents right from his crib, and bring them to Veles.
This Veles fellow asked me to find some documents in Lab X-14. I'm not sure if it'll help me find Strelok, but still decided to help.
Veles, the Sin leader, has agreed to exchange the disc for the "Moonlight" artifact. I might should've clapped him... but let's try to handle this the peaceful way.
Well, I just need to find the disc and return it to Comrade General now.
The disc is secured; now I need to bring all this stuff to Comrade General - he'll be pleased for sure!
I need to leave the mine prior to dealing with the task.
